text: Do what you love and the money will follow.
author: Marsha Sinetar

text: All my life I knew that there was all the money you could want out there. All you have to do is go after it.
author: Curtis Carlson

text: If the money we donate helps one child or can ease the pain of one parent, those funds are well spent.
author: Carl Karcher

text: An important lever for sustained action in tackling poverty and reducing hunger is money.
author: Gro Harlem Brundtland

text: It is money, money, money! Not ideas, not principles, but money that reigns supreme in American politics.
author: Robert Byrd
